"Beach Wars!":
"Summer's here! The beach is here! Big sister Xie is here!
Now is THE season for beach-going on Planet Wopal!
Yet, perhaps because of the heat, the Oceanids have gone wild, and Darkers have suddenly appeared, leaving our vacation plans in shambles!
We need all ARKS to lend their power in order to take our oasis of relaxation back!
So, come on, let's get this beautiful beach back already!
――――――――――――――――――――
Fail: Time limit expires"
